summary: When Jack Deebs was behind bars he found escape by creating Cool World, a cartoon series featuring a vixen named Holli Would. The flesh proves weaker than ink, however, as Holli takes human form in Las Vegas.
cast: Janni Brenn|Brad Pitt|William Frankfather|Greg Collins|Maurice LaMarche|Gabriel Byrne|Joey Camen|Kim Basinger|Michael David Lally|Michele Abrams|Carrie Hamilton|Stephen Worth|Murray Podwal|Jenine Jennings|Gregory Snegoff|Candi Milo|Charlie Adler|Patrick Pinney|Deirdre O'Connell|Frank Sinatra Jr.|Kevin L. Jackson|Paul Ben-Victor|Big Yank|Bobby Bell|Gary Friedkin|Clare Hoak|Antonio Hoyos|Leroy Thompson|Emma Blackwell|Lorraine Cote|Scott Kirkwood|Maggie Roswell
title: Una rubia entre dos mundos (Cool World)
